ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:06:26 [Issue ID 4000-373367] urn:comicvine:4000-373367
ComicInfo.Summary:
Gord Cantrell, Kirby Hale, and Asher Cobb make for odd traveling companions. Each of them wants to find the guns for different reasons, but they are united against common enemies. Meanwhile, it's all-out war in the heart of a supernatural blizzard! Drake and Becky have been terrorized by the Wendigo spirit, but now they are taking the fight to the creature itself.
